Summary: orange flickering light, 3 groups: 1 ufo then 2, then another 2 joined
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around May 12th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthe montreal canadians just won the east quarter finals of the stanley cup series against pittsburg (against all odds), everybody (a lot of people!) was outside celebrating and having fun. then i (and a friend) saw what seemed like airplane lights coming from the north west to us about 45 deg elevation over the buildings. then it stopped (gradually), so we thought its a helicopter with a weird orange light...then another 2 of these crafts appeared from the north, slowly joined the other light, then a couple of minutes later, another two. they all disappeared going slowly to the west. had these been helicopters, the sound would have been pretty loud, and 5 like helicopters hovering over montreal at the same time, even the canadian army does not blow money this way. these were no flares, i know what a flare looks like (they parachute for one thing, and they smoke like hell too). these ufos were steady in altitude. it really looked like somebody was observing the people celebrating outside, just like a police helicopter would, but five silent police helicopters in montreal ? the montreal police doesn't even own one. the light was orange and flickering, not like navigation lights, larger and sort of fuzzy. i know a guy filed a video with youtube, what he descibes is different from what i saw by the number of ufos, and maybe the color, white on the video, orange in my observation. but the timing and general appearance is the same. what's odd is that on the same evening (and i just found out now as i surfed the net for other reports of may 12) that the sci-fi channel in the us was talking about a mass sighting in montreal in 1990 (which i've never heard about until now). odd.
